_NB: If option is specified in command line, session_name and time_first_frame_UTC will come from this file. We can processed multiple session

session_info._NB: flag that deletes all the processed files for the current session (frames, gps processed files, bathy files etc)

dcim._NB: insert the date and time following the format YYYY:MM:DD HH:MM:SS.000
insert the time in UTC+0 format
After split videos, session_name_1_{first_frame_to_keep} to match with time_first_frame_UTC. All previous frames are removed
Exclude specific interval for frames with UTC interval : [['2023:11:03 05:14:13.00', '2023:11:03 05:18:48.00']]
